alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:43AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Beauregard and Allen Parishes through 215 AM CDT... At 143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reeves, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinder, Oberlin, Reeves, Dry Creek, Mittie, Harmony and Leblanc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central and southwestern Louisiana.
